CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: PAVmed Inc is a medical device company engaged in advancing a pipeline of medical technologies from concept to commercialization using a business model focused on capital and time efficiency. Its product includes EsoCheck; CarpX; EsoGuard; PortIO; DisappEAR and others.
